comments.text: Bug 589146 implemented split menus using an hbox with a binding and custom popup handling code. We should add support for split menu items in nsMenuFrame/nsXULPopupManager so that we can get rid of that custom code, and to help sort out some of the differences in behavior (bug 628807, bug 628048).
